identity.name: The Studio
identity.tone: Energetic, Structured, Neo-Brutalist, Gen Z Friendly

usage.gradients: None. Use solid blocks of color.

visual_enhancers.textures: Use a subtle dot grid pattern on the background (bg-[url('https://grainy-gradients.vercel.app/noise.svg')] opacity-5)
visual_enhancers.animations: Micro-interactions on hover. Page transitions: Slide up.

teacher_view.card_style: Dense, information-heavy, but with brutalist borders

buttons.primary: bg-black text-white border-2 border-black hover:bg-violet-600 hover:text-white shadow-[4px_4px_0px_0px_rgba(0,0,0,1)] active:translate-y-1 active:shadow-none font-bold uppercase tracking-wide py-3 px-6
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-black border-2 border-black hover:bg-lime-400 shadow-[4px_4px_0px_0px_rgba(0,0,0,1)] active:translate-y-1 active:shadow-none font-bold uppercase tracking-wide py-3 px-6

inputs.default: border-2 border-black bg-white p-4 text-lg focus:ring-2 focus:ring-lime-400 focus:border-black outline-none shadow-[2px_2px_0px_0px_rgba(0,0,0,1)] placeholder:text-gray-400

images.description: Diverse group of teenagers collaborating, used for Landing Page Hero
Podcast microphone, used for 'Day 5: Final Version' or Header Art
Sticky notes, used for 'Day 1: Topic Planning' background or card

media.icons: Use 'Lucide React' with bold stroke width (stroke-2 or stroke-3)

accessibility.contrast: Ensure 4.5:1 contrast ratio. Black text on White/Lime/Violet is safe.
accessibility.focus_states: Visible thick lime/black ring on focus.

instructions_to_main_agent.step_1: Install dependencies: `npm install lucide-react framer-motion clsx tailwind-merge`
instructions_to_main_agent.step_2: Configure Tailwind: Add the custom colors and extend the theme to support the 'shadow-[4px_4px_0px_0px_rgba(0,0,0,1)]' utility naturally if needed, or just use arbitrary values.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_3: Create the Layout Wrapper: A main container with the dot grid background.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_4: Build the 'Day' Navigation: A vertical list on desktop, horizontal scroll on mobile. It must look like a 'Level Select' screen.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_5: Implement the Forms: Use the 'Input' and 'Textarea' styles defined above. Do not use default browser styles.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_6: Teacher Dashboard: Use a table layout but style the rows as individual cards or with thick borders.

do_not: Do not use gradients for backgrounds.
Do not use rounded-full buttons (use rounded-none or rounded-md).
Do not use gray text for important labels (use black).
must_do: Use 2px black borders on ALL containers.
Make it fun! Add emoji or icons to section headers.
